metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4922 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - untriaged
metadata.Description:
The tor_timegm function in common/util.c in Tor before 0.2.2.39, and0.2.3.x before 0.2.3.22-rc, does not properly validate time values, whichallows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure anddaemon exit) via a malformed directory object, a different vulnerabilitythan CVE-2012-4419.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4922` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tor - 0.2.3.22-rc-1
tor-geoipdb - 0.2.3.22-rc-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tor package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.2.3.22-rc-1').
